name: Slime Jumping
description:
Hello and welcome! In this game, you will play a little slime to jump higher for coins. The slime can move, jump, collect, and be killed by the obstacle stones.

The progression is endless. Try your best to get more coins for the little slime and jump higher. There is no win condition but endless progression. However, the slime dies when you control it to hit the obstacles or fall to the lowest bottom.

Tips for control:

  • WASD = move the slime
  • Space = jump
  • ESC = quite the game

Have a nice playing experience!
